thread.title: LeBron James dunked 7 times in a game, which he hasn’t done since 2009
thread.title_full: LeBron James dunked 7 times in a game, which he hasn’t done since 2009

author: Tim Cato
title: LeBron James dunked 7 times in a game, which he hasn’t done since 2009
text:
James is 32 years old, remember!
LeBron James dunked seven times in Thursday’s game against the Detroit Pistons . You can watch all seven right here.
LeBron James (circa 2007) put on a dunk show in the Palace tonight! Watch: pic.twitter.com/gBnbHbMRYf 
— NBA (@NBA) March 10, 2017 James’ seven dunks are tied for the most times he has dunked in a single game, and he hasn’t done that since 2009.
We mentioned LeBron's 7 dunks..that ties a career high..his most in a game in over 8 years..
— Fred McLeod (@CavsFredMcLeod) March 10, 2017 James finished with 29 points and 12 made field goals on 22 shot attempts. He’s having one of his best three-point shooting seasons, but he missed all six attempts from before the arc on Thursday, getting his money’s worth at the rim instead. This was a cool look at one of the seven dunks from the game.
The evolution of a LeBron James dunk. pic.twitter.com/wBx4qfycHO 
— SportsCenter (@SportsCenter) March 10, 2017 At least one former teammate was loving it, though he overestimated how many times James actually did dunk.
What's that 9 dunks tonite for @KingJames #YoungLegs 
— DWade (@DwyaneWade) March 10, 2017 Despite James’ efforts, Cleveland still lost 106-101 to Detroit.
